Welcome to Our Lovely Store

We have a variety types of plants from common to rare. If you are new to the plant world, we love to help you along the way. Come check us out and see if there's a plant for you. Let us help you pair up that works with your environment and schedule. Don't worry if you don't have a green thumb yet, we're here to help.

Hone in on your plant vibe

From complex to simplicity, we got a plant for you

We got what you need and want. Not sure where to go, not a problem. Our motto is always one plant at a time. If you feel adventerous, that's cool too! Need help making sure your plants are taken care of? We have classes to help you along the way.
